mapper.select: SELECT ticket_purchase.purchase_date, CUSTOMER_INFO.customer_id, tsgroup.sum TSG, fsgroup.sum FSG, SUM(tsgroup.sum + fsgroup.sum) SUM FROM CUSTOMER_INFO JOIN TICKET_PURCHASE ON (customer_info.customer_id = ticket_purchase.customer_id) JOIN TICKET_CLASS_INFO ON (ticket_purchase.ticket_class_code = ticket_class_info.ticket_class_code) JOIN FSGROUP ON (ticket_purchase.ticket_pub_code = FSGROUP.ticket_pub_code) JOIN TSGROUP ON (customer_info.CUSTOMER_ID = TSGROUP.CUSTOMER_ID) WHERE PURCHASE_DATE = '210707' group by ticket_purchase.purchase_date, customer_info.customer_id, TSGROUP.customer_id, Tsgroup.sum, ticket_class_info.ticket_price, ticket_class_info.ticket_price, fsgroup.sum
